events.title: A stranger approaches
events.event_body_text: A lone black ant approaches your party. What do you do?

events.title: Fight!
events.event_body_text: You see two ants fighting. What do you do?

events.title: Dinner is served?
events.event_body_text: You see some hungry-looking ants have cornered a worm. What do you do?

options.text: A free lunch! Join the ants
